Question: AUTOCRYPT CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AUTOCRYPT CES 2024

- Industry-leading vehicle-to-everything (V2X) and software-defined vehicle (SDV) security solutions
- Integration of V2X security library into a world-renowned Tier 1 telematics supplier's onboard units (OBU)
- Supports all major regional SCMS standards, including North American SCMS, European CCMS, and Chinese C-SCMS
- V2X PKI provider demonstrating interoperability within the European CCMS standard
- Showcased secure V2X infrastructure for over 3,000 miles of smart roads in South Korea
- V2X security library deployed in best-selling vehicle models
- Highlighted at CES 2024, emphasizing automotive cybersecurity for software-defined vehicles
- Showcased embedded systems and V2X security solutions for SDVs
- Chief Security Research Officer (CSRO) recognized at 2024 MotorTrend SDV Innovator Awards
- Collaboration with Cohda Wireless to develop a full-stack, secure V2X solution for automotive OEMs and Tier-1 suppliers
Summary_cn:
2024年CES车辆加密展示会

- 业界领先的车辆对一切(V2X)和软件定义车辆(SDV)安全解决方案
- 将V2X安全库整合到世界知名的一级车联供应商的车载单元
- 支持所有主要地区的SCMS标准，包括北美SCMS、欧洲CCMS和中国C-SCMS
- V2X PKI供应商展示在欧洲CCMS标准下的互操作性
- 在韩国展示了超过3000英里智能道路的安全V2X基础设施
- V2X安全库已部署在畅销车型中
- 在CES 2024上亮相，强调面向软件定义车辆的汽车网络安全
- 展示了嵌入式系统和面向SDV的V2X安全解决方案
- 首席安全研究官(CSRO)在2024年MotorTrend SDV创新奖中获得认可
- 与Cohda Wireless合作，为汽车OEM和一级供应商开发全套安全的V2X解决方案。
